DOC.brief_summary: When attempt wean patient ventilator , even he/she pass spontaneous breathe test , 10-20 % time extubation failure occur patient reintubated . When patient reintubated mortality rate increase length intensive care unit stay also increase . It vital intensively assess patient extubation correctly predict extubation success . Muscular ultrasound may helpful situation .
DOC.brief_title: The Role Muscular Ultrasound Predicting Weaning Success
DOC.criteria: Adult patient undergo wean mechanical ventilation Patients mechanically ventilate 72 hr Pregnant patient Patients previous neuromuscular disease Difficulties muscular ultrasound ( Dressing , operation , etc )
